page.title: 08Hatfield Heath Festival (2)
page.content: Although the actual festival lasts for two weeks, the main events are held during a weekend in the middle of June. As well as all the sideshows there are many arena events such as demonstrations in Karate and B.M.X. riding. The local children are involved in a pageant or fancy dress competition and they also give a display of country dancing. There is an exhibition of paintings by local artists in the village hall. There are various contests such as horse shoe throwing, tug of war and custard pie throwing. This year on the Sunday there was a 5 mile Fun Run which attracted about 150 competitors. During the fortnight other events include a children's film show, an inter-village quiz, plays in the village hall, a B.M.X. evening and many, many more.
